thread.title: Luke Cino
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by Luke Cino

author: Luke Cino
title: Luke Cino
text:
I have been in Real Estate sales and been in the top 10% of all Realtors in the greater Rochester area for the last 20 + years.
I have worked with many Mortgage companies & representatives/brokers. I can tell you that no matter who you are or what you are buying Premium Mortgage Reps always get back to you timely and don't make you jump through unnecessary hoops to get the deal closed!
I refer them on a regular basis.
